name: Fox Sports Soccer '99
description:
Back of Jewel Case - PlayStation (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

WATCH FOX SPORTS. PLAY FOX SPORTS.

  • FAST AND FLUID GAMEPLAY
  • OVER 120 TOTAL TEAMS
    • 64 National Teams
    • 64 League Teams
  • 24 UNIQUE STADIUMS
  • CONTROL THE REPLAY SPEEDS
  • CHOOSE YOUR SKILL LEVEL
    • Amateur, Semi-Pro, Pro, and International
  • CREATE YOUR OWN LEAGUES AND TOURNAMENTS
  • "AMBIENT REALISM"
    • True soccer match atmosphere, including crowd sounds and chants
  • IMPROVE YOUR SKILLS IN PRACTICE MODE
